com.digitalglobe.platform2020.identity.configuration.collector

Interface OpinionatedEndpointCollector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotationBasedOpinionatedEndpointCollector, CamelRestEndpointCollector, CXFEndpointCollector, SpringMVCEndpointCollector

    public interface OpinionatedEndpointCollector
    Collect endpoints (combination of HTTP method and URI) that should use the given security opinion
    Author:
    Josh Ghiloni

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RequestMatcher NO_REQUESTS 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RequestMatcher collectEndpoints(AuthenticationType requestType)
      Create a request matcher representing all URIs that should use the opinion specified by requestType

    • Field Detail

      • NO_REQUESTS

        static final RequestMatcher NO_REQUESTS

    • Method Detail

      • collectEndpoints

        RequestMatcher collectEndpoints(AuthenticationType requestType)
                         throws EndpointsNotInitializedException
        Create a request matcher representing all URIs that should use the opinion specified by requestType
        Parameters:
        requestType - The AuthenticationType of requests to collect, or null if no requests match this type
        Returns:
        a request matcher with all the URIs for that AuthenticationType
        Throws:
        EndpointsNotInitializedException - if the collector is not ready to collect endpoints yet
